item.description:
Hello yes I am baaaack! Please join me for my final trek out to the Melting Pot before the warmer weather really arrives.

Girls' Night Out
Mondays

Catch up with the girls for an evening of fun and interactive fondue!
Our well-priced Girls' Night menu is offered every Monday and we
will feature the likes of complimentary massages, skin care specialists,
palm and tarot card readers (additional charge) on the following nights:



Girls Night Out Menu - Review the Meatless $25 Option On The Left

For the amount of food that you get this is a very good deal!

Any questions? Please ask or check out The Melting Pot



If your plans change please update your RSVP so that someone else can join us.

Thank you for being considerate!
item.how_to_find_us: Bar area - my picture is accurate - my # will be sent out to my final attendees
item.name: The Melting Pot - Girls Night Out - Men Are Welcome!
